stanza.line: Is it for fear to wet a widoweye
That thou consum thy self in singlelife
Ah if thou issueless shalt hap todie
The world will wail thee like a makelesswife
The world will be thy widow and stillweep
That thou no form of thee hast leftbehind
When every private widow well maykeep
By children eyes her husband shape inmind
Look what an unthrift in the world dothspend
Shifts but his place for still the world enjoys it
But beauty waste hath in the world anend
And kept unused the user so destroys it
No love toward others in that bosomsits
That on himself such murdrous shamecommits
